description_html:
Created from Nero Marquina marble, this product celebrates the elegance and intricacies of a material used to create refined and seemingly timeless designs. This item item is well suited for a range of bathroom designs ranging from classic to modern and the installation process is designed for buyers' convenience.

The collection in which the faucet is included features 23 components, including lavatory and bath faucets, shower and tub fittings and accessories. The collection is offered in two marble finishes (Bianco Carrara and Nero Marquina), a standard polished chrome along with 16 custom plating finishes which are produced on-site at Aquabrass’ Montreal facility and that range from a sparkling rose gold, to black nickel, matte black and more.

Additionally, two spout options have been offered for select models; curved for a contemporary appearance and an “L” shape spout for an urban feel.
